titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at St. Mary Spittle on Easter Tuesday 1613. By Roger Fenton D. in Diuinitie
titleStmt.author: Fenton, Roger, 1565-1616.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Eliot's Court Press?] for William Aspley,

notesStmt.note: With 3 other sermons: "A sermon preached at Mercer chapell in Lent 1614" , "A sermon preached at the funerall of Mr. Iohn Stokele citizen and marchant-taylor of London" and "A sermon preached at the funerall of Mr. Iohn Newman citizen and grocer of London"; each has separate dated title page; pagination and register are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
